content: a super chunky headband with a front twist seaming yarn estelle merino xl 100% superwash merino wool fold headband in half lengthwise right sides together 160 yards per 200g take the two folded end edges both pointing in the needles 8 0mm same direction and layer them between each other watch this video https //bit ly/3z8sqm0 for a sizes small large with finished circumference of 19 demonstration using the tail of yarn stitch securely 21 headbands fit best when a few inches smaller across all four layers tie off the yarn when finish and than the head that will wear them weave in all ends turn the headband right side out and enjoy gauge 18sts per 4 in unstretched ribbing other tools & notions darning needle headband cast on 23 25 sts row 1 ws sl1 k1 p1 to end of row row 2 rs sl1 p1 k1 to end of row abbreviations repeat row 1 and 2 until work is 19 21 long k knit p purl bind off all sts and break yarn leaving a 18 tail sl1 slip one stitch knitwise st s stitch es © 2023 galt house of yarn all rights reserved v1 1 www galthouseofyarn ca
